=== Development Academy ===
* Our main goal is to help new users who want to get involved in Ubuntu Development. The Academy will do this by organising online sessions in IRC. 
* Ubuntu Classroom blog entries on <nowiki>[[http://en.wordpress.com/tag/beginners-team-dev-academy/| Dev Academy classes]]</nowiki>
==== Programming Languages and Topics ====
